title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 296: Featuring Noah Hanifin
description:
On Monday’s episode of Spittin’ Chiclets the guys are joined by Noah Hanifin. The Flames Dman joined the pod (39:34) to talk about playing in the bubble, the Flames season ending, his nickname “Brick” and a bunch more. The guys also preview the Stanley Cup Final, while Whit pays his respects to Islanders fans one last time this season. The boys also touch on tons of NHL news, including the Eric Staal trade to Buffalo. The boys wrap up with some golf about the US Open.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
